document_data.name: Dagnabbet Waybeard
document_data.mainbody: '''Dagnabbet Waybeard''' was the general of [[Mithral Hall]] in [[Luruar]].
document_data.History:
Dagnabbet served as general under King [[Connerad Brawnanvil]] in [[1484 DR]] during the [[Darkening]], a time when Mithral Hall was under threat from the [[orc]]s of the [[Kingdom of Many-Arrows]].

Around [[1486 DR]] Dagnabbet was the first Queen of Mithril Hall.
document_data.Relationships: Dagnabbet was the daughter of [[Dagnabbit]] and the granddaughter of [[Dagna Waybeard]].
